title: 6.0 external storage
body:
feeding off this post i created: https://forum.owncloud.org/viewtopic.php?f=26&t=18602

thanks for your input - after some thinking - i now have green dot. 

however, i cannot get the folder to show up under users? how do i accomplish? in the log for the user i am getting the following:

filemtime(): stat failed for /var/www/html/owncloud/data/b63e4742-6681-4343-9a8a-d2c0ae8ba207/files_trashbin/files at /var/www/html/owncloud/lib/private/files/storage/local.php#127

the external storage parameters are as follows:

folder name: local external storage: local configuration: /canalfiles/ applicable: "user name"

mount.json looks like this:

{"user":{"b63e4742-6681-4343-9a8a-d2c0ae8ba207":{"\/$user\/files\/local":{"class":"\oc\files\storage\local","options":{"datadir":"\/canalfiles\/"}}}}}

any help (once again, if it can be directed so a child could follow) would be greatly appreciated.
